programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.title: The Card Counter
programme.desc: William Tell is a gambler and former serviceman who sets out to reform a young man seeking revenge on a mutual enemy from their past. Tell just wants to play cards. His spartan existence on the casino trail is shattered when he is approached by Cirk, a vulnerable and angry young man seeking help to execute his plan for revenge on a military colonel. Tell sees a chance at redemption through his relationship with Cirk.

programme.title: Chuka
programme.desc: Frontier yarn about an itinerant gunfighter who arrives at a remote cavalry outpost run by a disgraced English officer. The gunman is reunited with a woman from whom he has long been separated, but the prospect of happiness is undermined by the threat of an impending Indian attack. When the hostiles finally do move against the fort, the sole slender chance for survival lies with the gunfighters ability to broker a peace agreement.

programme.desc: FBI agent Dana Lewis suspects that a 25-year-old rape-murder case in New York is connected to several unsolved cases across the country and joins the SVU to investigate the crimes. Lewis relentlessly pursues her prime suspect, but Benson and Amaro have their doubts about his guilt.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detective Rollins comes home to find her sister in her apartment, and the SVU squad does all it can to keep her safe from an unexpected visitor.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The squad is left reeling from the fallout after Captain Cragen wakes up with a dead escort - a potential witness in a case - in his bed. Tensions run high in the precinct as the detectives contend with the investigation of Cragen, as well as the arrival of a tough new captain.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The best-selling author of an erotic novel is attacked and the subsequent investigation leads the team to a popular TV talk-show host.

programme.title: NCIS: Hawaii
programme.desc: Captain Milius continues to work with Tennant and her team in the aftermath of the prisoner exchange between U.S. and Eastern Europe; Whistler takes Ernies advice and makes a grand gesture in hopes of winning back Lucy.

programme.title: Sight Unseen
programme.desc: Jake and Tess are investigating the shooting of a trucker when the Vice Squad shows up, demanding they cut their main suspect loose before they compromise one of Vices investigations.

programme.title: Doctor Who
programme.desc: The Master allies himself with strange sea creatures in his quest to conquer the Earth.

programme.desc: BBC FOUR is the BBC channel for people who want more. More depth, more range, more to stimulate the mind.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: The North York Moors provide a picturesque setting for Reverend Richard Coles on a winter walk through this historic landscape.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: The Yorkshire Shepherdess, Amanda Owen, explores familiar territory as she crosses hills and fields through Wensleydale and Raydale on her Winter Walk. Taking ancient routes first made by the Romans, Amanda meets fellow sheep farmers.

programme.title: Winters Weirdest Events
programme.desc: Using state-of-the-art science, expert analysis and first-hand eyewitness accounts, Chris Packham examines the evidence, tests the theories and unravels some of the strangest stories our planet has to offer. Based in a remote hut for the winter, Chris embarks on a fascinating journey to try to explain some of winters weirdest events.

programme.title: Leonardo
programme.sub-title: The Secret Life of the Mona Lisa
programme.desc: Alan Yentob tells the story of the creation of the worlds most famous work of art. She has her own bodyguards and lives in Paris in a humidified, air-conditioned box protected by triplex bullet proof glass. Despite this she is visited by six million tourists every year. She is Leonardo da Vincis Mona Lisa.

programme.title: Britains Pompeii: A Village Lost in Time
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts joins the team excavating a 3,000 year-old Bronze Age village in the Cambridgeshire Fens thats been called the British Pompeii. The village earned its nickname because, 3,000 years ago, it burned to the ground - as it burned, it fell into the peat, preserving both the houses and their contents. Until its discovery, we had little real idea of what life was like in Bronze Age Britain.

programme.title: On Camera: Photographers at the BBC
programme.desc: Drawing on the BBCs rich archive, this programme reveals the working practices, lives and opinions of some of the greatest photographers of the last 60 years.

programme.title: The Magical World of Julia Donaldson
programme.desc: A celebration of the life and work of one of Britains best-selling childrens authors, with unique access to Julia Donaldson, her family, her rich archives and home movies, and the remarkable cast of characters that have sprung from her imagination. Specially commissioned animated illustrations from her long-term illustrator Axel Scheffler will bring Julias biography to life.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: The North York Moors provide a picturesque setting for Reverend Richard Coles on a winter walk through this historic landscape.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: The Yorkshire Shepherdess, Amanda Owen, explores familiar territory as she crosses hills and fields through Wensleydale and Raydale on her Winter Walk. Taking ancient routes first made by the Romans, Amanda meets fellow sheep farmers.

programme.title: Woolly Mammoth: Secrets from the Ice
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts reveals the natural history of the Ice Ages woolly mammoth. Mammoths have transfixed humans since the depths of the last Ice Age when their herds roamed across what is now Europe and Asia. Although extinct for thousands of years, scientists can now paint an incredibly detailed picture of their lives thanks to whole carcasses beautifully preserved in the Siberian permafrost.

programme.title: Winters Weirdest Events
programme.desc: Using state-of-the-art science, expert analysis and first-hand eyewitness accounts, Chris Packham examines the evidence, tests the theories and unravels some of the strangest stories our planet has to offer. Based in a remote hut for the winter, Chris embarks on a fascinating journey to try to explain some of winters weirdest events.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: The snow-covered hillsides of Ribblesdale are the setting for Alastair Campbells Winter Walk through the Yorkshire Dales. Fog and snow dont deter the political veteran as he makes his way through the county he was born and raised in.

programme.title: Christmas University Challenge
programme.sub-title: University of Hull v University of the West of England
programme.desc: The heats continue as four alumni of the University of Hull, captained by actor Sian Reese-Williams, face four graduates of the University of the West of England, led by science reporter Victoria Gill. Jeremy Paxman asks the questions.

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim has his first clash with the Foreign Office when he is called upon to prevent a Commonwealth country from being taken over by Marxists.

programme.title: Yes, Prime Minister
programme.desc: Jim must recommend the appointment of bishops to the Queen but is not keen on the two offered by the Church and Humphrey has his own reasons for wanting a third.

programme.title: Timeshift
programme.desc: Solar scientist Dr Lucie Green takes a journey back through Britains most turbulent and dramatic weather history.

programme.title: The Hidden Children of Ruinerwold Farm
programme.desc: As their fathers trial starts, the four older children unpack the painful allegations of physical, emotional and sexual abuse and finally meet their five younger siblings, all now young adults, who continue to support their father.

programme.title: The Hidden Children of Ruinerwold Farm
programme.desc: As their fathers physical and mental state delays the trial, the four older children regroup, concerned for the welfare of their five younger siblings.

programme.title: Turtle, Eagle, Cheetah: A Slow Odyssey
programme.desc: Join three young cheetah siblings, orphans, as they set out across the savannah in Namibia in search of prey. The orphaned cats are being reintroduced into the wilds of Namibia and specially designed on-board cameras are being used to monitor their progress. The summer rains have turned the land into a verdant scene, unleashing new sounds, sights and smells for the young cats to experience.

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: The snow-covered hillsides of Ribblesdale are the setting for Alastair Campbells Winter Walk through the Yorkshire Dales. Fog and snow dont deter the political veteran as he makes his way through the county he was born and raised in.

programme.title: The Truth About Christmas Carols
programme.desc: There could be nothing more sweet and sentimental than the sound of traditional carols performed by a velvet-voiced choir at Christmas, or so you would think. Composer Howard Goodall uncovers the surprising and often secret history of the Christmas carol. Far from being accepted as part of the celebrations of Jesus birth, over the centuries carols have been banned by both church and state.

programme.title: Leonardo
programme.sub-title: The Secret Life of the Mona Lisa
programme.desc: Alan Yentob tells the story of the creation of the worlds most famous work of art. She is Leonardo da Vincis Mona Lisa.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: At Longleat Safari Park, the keepers are working hard to get the animals ready for winter. Joy spreads across the park as the keepers welcome some early Christmas presents - lots of new arrivals from afar, including furry binturongs, cute fennec foxes, adorable dik diks and some jumpy ostriches. Kate and Ben follow their first steps into the park as the keepers nervously mix them with the current residents. And will a long-term cheetah romance come good at Christmas?

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: A house in Hednesford in Staffordshire, and two retail spaces in Norwich and Weymouth are bought at online auctions by developers who all see the bricks and mortar as investments. All three projects take longer, or cost more than originally planned, but the investors reckon they will still turn a profit.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Roo Irvine learns about the long history of salmon fishing on the River Tweed. The teams shop in Kelso, but will the bidders take the bait at Paul Laidlaws auction in Carlisle?

programme.desc: Sara Cox welcomes Sandra, a Glaswegian grandmother with an extraordinary past. She longs for a miniature of her grandparents tenement kitchen: the true heart of her childhood home. With no photos, miniaturist Abi faces her toughest builds yet.

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Leatherworker Dani is skilled in her craft and hopes to grow her fledgling business. Masooma is a talented artist but needs to find the right market for her creations to succeed.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise Nurse is in the Carmarthenshire countryside, showing a retired couple from Jersey some special homes, including one which comes complete with some beavers in the backyard.

programme.title: Animal Park
programme.desc: As Christmas approaches, will there be love, actually, for fennec fox Anthony? He has been single and ready to mingle for a while, and all his Christmases have come at once with the arrival of foxy new girl Zuri. But will she show him any interest? Meanwhile, new binturong Baloo is settling into his enclosure, eagerly anticipating a first meeting with a new mate. But the Christmas tryst doesnt go to plan as the boisterous binturong escapes!

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Jacqui catches up with an ambitious project to develop five luxury flats in Crystal Palace, while Martel follows a quirky lot with bags of potential in Stoke, and Tommy talks to a full-time teacher who has the vision to create a lovely family home in Bexleyheath, combining a modern feel while retaining lovely period features.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: In Exeter, Alan on the blue team reveals he played in a band with rock and roll icon David Bowie, and our very own Christina discovers a fine collection of postcards. The reds are set a challenge to find an animal-themed item. They go on to sniff out a brass fox head doorstop, while the blues take a shine to an art nouveau garnet and pearl necklace. It gets pretty close at the end when the reds spend too long reflecting on a late Victorian silver mirror and nearly run out of time.

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Sara Cox meets lifelong friends Sue and Kathie, who want a miniature of Winford Hospital in Somerset, where they trained as nurses in the 1960s. Miniaturist Hannah recreates a ward and a sitting room, capturing the hard work of their youth.

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Offshore engineer Andy dreams of a career in blacksmithing to spend more time at home. Willow weaver Ciara has potential, but can she speed up production to make enough profit?

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson joins two fitness fans hunting for a dream Cornish home near the coast. After some promising house tours, they all try a spot of gig boat racing in Padstow.

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.desc: Nigel Havers welcomes sellers of collectibles and curiosities to the Bidding Rooms home in Edinburgh, where they ply their wares to five dealers. The first, hopeful seller is Mike, with a vintage poster from 1920s Paris. Next in is Joe, with his team of boys, Fabio and Gino. Theyve brought a late 20th-century football table. Third into Edinburgh HQ are Kate and Dan, with an item thats more than what it seems.

programme.title: BlacKkKlansman
programme.desc: Ron Stallworth is the first African-American detective to serve in the Colorado Springs Police Department. Determined to make a name for himself, Stallworth bravely sets out on a dangerous mission: infiltrate and expose the Ku Klux Klan. The detective soon recruits a more seasoned colleague, Flip Zimmerman, into the undercover investigation of a lifetime. Together, they team up to take down the extremist hate group as the organization aims to sanitize its rhetoric to appeal to the mainstream.

programme.title: Ashley Cain: Into the Danger Zone
programme.desc: South Africa has for years battled the scourge of rhino poaching, fuelled by insatiable demand for their horns in Asia. Ashley embarks on a mission to find out who is behind these brutal acts, discovering how the challenges young men face growing up in deprived rural communities can lead to illegal poaching. Hanging out with men from KwaZulu-Natal - or Zululand - he earns their trust and joins them on a legal hunt for bushmeat in order to understand what day-to-day life is like here.

programme.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
programme.desc: Globetrotting sequel in which intrepid archaeologist Lara Croft is recruited by British intelligence to track down mad bioweapons genius Dr Reiss, who holds the orb showing the whereabouts of the mythical Pandoras Box. When he threatens to unleash a deadly plague contained within it, Lara and her marine-turned-mercenary partner face a race against time to scupper his evil plan.

programme.title: Matthew Perry and the Ketamine Queen
Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: After the success of his comeback fight, Tommys road to redemption hits a major setback - his hand is injured again and needs eight weeks total rest before doctors will know if he can fight again. The last time he couldnt train, his life spiralled out of control, so now Tommy throws himself into a frenzy of activity: a TV appearance on The Wheel, family days out with Bambi, and a final push to finish the home he hopes Molly and Bambi will soon return to.

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys recovery is back on track after he and John put his hand to the test. The pair are training again, and the search for Tommys next opponent begins. Eager to make the most of family time, Tommy splashes out on a £90,000 motor home for family trips with Molly and Bambi and takes his mum out for lunch and a long-overdue catch-up.

programme.title: One Zoo Three
programme.desc: The OZT brothers pack their binoculars to explore the natural world right on our doorstep, meeting some of the surprising urban wild animals that can be found in our towns and cities. Tyler finds himself holding onto a cliff edge in Bristol to find out why the fastest bird on earth, the peregrine falcon, is quickly becoming the top bird in town. Aaron heads to Devon to reveal how the water vole is being brought back from the brink of extinction.

programme.title: Deadly 60

programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand demonstrate an awesome body trick to amaze others with and reveal another way the human body heals itself after an injury. The doctors also look at some of their best bits of Operation Ouch so far.

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: A confused World War I soldier spends his first day in the trenches, William Wallace launches his music career as a rock rebel, Lady Jane Grey wins a frankly terrible competition and the Welsh women of Fishguard defeat a French invasion without even trying.

programme.title: Danny and Mick
programme.desc: Pop sensation Zoe Now is coming to officially open Pottsfield leisure centres new reception. With the aid of a cap and wig from lost property, lots of smoke and a backing track, Danny reckons nobody will spot the difference if he takes her place.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.sub-title: Our Father Whose Art Aint Heaven
programme.desc: Martin takes Frasier and Niles to a posh restaurant and then buys Frasier an expensive piece of art that it turns out he hates.

programme.title: American Pickers
programme.sub-title: Whos the Rarest of Them All?
programme.desc: The guys are in in Studebaker heaven, and visit to a designer with the rarest collection in the Midwest.

programme.title: Channel 4 News Summary
programme.desc: Channel 4s midday news summary.

programme.title: Chateau DIY at Christmas
programme.desc: Stephanie needs a yuletide miracle to get everything ready for her festive party. And Tim and Sasha are so close to hanging up their stockings with just one wedding to go.

programme.title: Jamies Easy Christmas
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver kicks off Christmas 2022 with some amazing, no-fuss dishes to get everyone in the spirit, including crispy duck, short rib beef, veggie filo pie and a decadent dessert.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Nisha Katona in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Retirees Liz and Tony want to escape the British winters and explore the beautiful island of Mallorca. Can Jean Johannson find them the perfect Balearic bolthole for their £190k?

programme.title: Kirsties Handmade Christmas
programme.desc: Its knitting needles at the ready for Kirsties best Christmas jumper competition. Four of the countrys top knitters are ready to unveil their handmade knits, but first they need to compete against the clock, and each other, in the timed challenge.

programme.title: The Great BandB Challenge
programme.desc: Its finals week, and the first couple move into the prize BandB to host some very important guests, while the other couples gather vital inspiration for their business plans.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps Fiona and Andy find a holiday home along the shores of Almería around the sun-kissed town of Mojácar. Jasmine shows Fiona and Andy what their budget of £210,000 can buy. But will any of them be their dream place in the sun?

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Includes sport and weather.

programme.title: Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: A short film for Stand Up To Cancer. When 15-year-old Callum collapses without warning in January 2025, doctors discover a brain tumour that changes everything.

programme.title: Jamies Cook-Ahead Christmas
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver shows us how to prep in advance so no one misses any festive fun! From gnarly gravy, savvy stuffing and flavoured butters, Jamie makes a freeze-ahead-of-time feast.

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.desc: Following the work of Bedfordshire Police around the clock and going behind the scenes of police investigations into major crimes. Cameras follow every twist and turn of the police pursuit and the facts turn out to be more compelling than fiction.

programme.title: A Little Bit of Stand Up To Cancer
programme.desc: Dermot Murnaghan launches the daily update of fundraising action for SU2C 2025. Expect headline-grabbing celebrity stunts, powerful stories and an unmissable look at the week ahead.

programme.title: Say Nothing
programme.desc: Brendan unearths a mole in the IRAs ranks.

programme.title: Emergency Helicopter Medics
programme.desc: The crew of Warwickshire, Northamptonshire, Derbyshire, Leicestershire and Rutland Air Ambulance race to reach Penny, who is in anaphylactic shock after a wasp sting.

programme.title: Rescue: Extreme Medics
programme.desc: The trauma team rush to help a man whos fallen headlong down a remote hillside. A woman has a serious chainsaw cut. And a motorcyclist has crashed at high speed on the motorway.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon continues to help Iberville Cuisine, in the French Quarter of New Orleans. Will the staff have to walk out and implement their plan B?

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: While Boston Market Chief Brand Officer Sara Bittorf is under cover, she terminates an employee and struggles to manage a busy drive-thru window.

programme.title: Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: A short film for Stand Up To Cancer. When 15-year-old Callum collapses without warning in January 2025, doctors discover a brain tumour that changes everything.

programme.title: Cancer Detectives: Finding the Cures
programme.desc: Pioneering scientists take on cancer. Can Professor Caroline Dive detect microscopic amounts of cancer in a patients blood and this way catch dangerous tumours early?

programme.title: Tahaan
programme.desc: Set against the rugged landscape of Kashmir, an eight-year-old mountain boy goes on a quest to find his beloved donkey but gets dragged into a violent conflict he doesnt understand.

programme.title: Bewafa Se Waffa
programme.desc: A couple suffers marital problems when they are unable to have a baby.

programme.title: Khoobsurat
programme.desc: Sanju, a kind man owes a smuggler a lot of money which puts him and Gudia, an orphan, in a trivial position. Later, he poses as an NRI in front of a family to con them out of money.

programme.title: Hasee Toh Phasee
programme.desc: Shes smart, but shes also quirky, geeky and a magnet for trouble. And, thats exactly what makes Nikhil fall for his fiancees sister, Meeta. With so many hurdles, their love seems set for disaster.

programme.title: Naqaab
programme.desc: Naqaab brings together director duo Abbas-Mastan with another thriller. The focus of the film shifts to the shady past of all the characters, with some unexpected elements thrown in.

programme.title: Amar Akbar Anthony
programme.desc: Three men who were raised in different households do not realise that they are brothers.

programme.title: R... Rajkumar
programme.desc: Rajkumar, an aimless youth, works for a drug baron and is sent to kill a rival dealer. His life is changed forever when he meets Chanda, and has no idea she is the adopted daughter of the man he is supposed to kill.

programme.title: Kambakkht Ishq
programme.desc: In Hollywood, a chauvinistic stuntman and a glamorous surgeon and sometime model share a love-hate relationship.

programme.title: Halla Bol
programme.desc: A self-centred, manipulative and arrogant Bollywood actor witnesses a murder committed by the sons of a government minister but decides to stay silent.

programme.title: Noyontara
programme.desc: Noyontara, a 23-year-old ghost-whisperer has always lived on the fringes, ridiculed for her rare gift. Her life takes a drastic turn when she marries Surjo, a man of science and reason.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Kissing
programme.desc: Rosss new wife wont speak to him, Rachel appoints Monica her adviser in romance, and Phoebe feels neglected.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe prepares to give birth but the doctor makes her nervous, Joey experiences his own pain, and Monica plans to go out on a date with a male nurse to spite Chandler.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Phoebe Hates PBS

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Ross tells Rachel that he cannot be around her once Emily comes to New York. Meanwhile, Chandler and Monica try to have a romantic weekend.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Monica and Rachel meet a monster, and will Ross obey Emily and move away from his friends?

programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Moves In
programme.desc: Joey and Chandler regret letting Ross move in with them, while Rachel schemes to get her new neighbour to ask her on a date.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One with All the Thanksgivings
programme.desc: As the gang digests Monicas huge Thanksgiving meal, everyone reminisces about their worst Thanksgiving ever.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Warning notes on Ross lunch causes concern among his co-workers, and Phoebe takes a literature class.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Inappropriate Sister
programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions
programme.desc: The friends make their New Year resolutions, and Joey tries to arrange for Chandler to kiss Monica at midnight at a New Years Eve party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandlers Work Laugh
programme.desc: Monica is annoyed when she discovers Chandler is ingratiating himself with his new boss Doug. He even has a fake laugh which he uses whenever Doug cracks a joke. Meanwhile, Rachel is obsessed with finding out the gossip between Monica and Chandler after overhearing a sexy conversation between them, and Ross astounds everyone with his new girlfriend, a blast from the past.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: At her grandmothers funeral, Phoebe is astounded to meet her biological father, Frank Sr, who she has been trying to find for years. Elsewhere, Chandler tells perfectionist Monica that she is useless at massage, and Joeys fondness for an expensive bag loses him an audition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: Chandler and Monicas relationship becomes less of a secret, and Ross must prove to his boss that hes sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl Who Hits Joey
programme.desc: Chandler becomes anxious when he thinks Monica wants more from their relationship, and Ross moves into his new apartment and fails to impress his new neighbours. Meanwhile, Joey is afraid to end his relationship with a diminutive woman who punches him hard every time she thinks something is fun.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: A Burger Burglar and a Supermarket Sweeper
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr, Jamali Maddix and GK Barry have some controversial behaviour to contend with. Theres a shopping trolley thief, and a mother and daughter settle an awkward dispute.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The next stop on Bradley and Barney Walshs European road trip is Switzerland. They take in the breath-taking views with a ride on a mountain rollercoaster, before exercising their vocal chords when they try the Swiss tradition of yodeling. The following day, Barney arranges a unique way for them to enjoy some local cheese, and then drive to the Contra Dam, where Barney reveals they are about to attempt one of James Bonds most iconic stunts, a petrifying 220 metre-high bungee jump.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The father and son have reached Slovenia, a country that loves its sport. Brads passion for bikes gives Barney an excuse to take his dad motocross racing. After hearing that one in 200 people in Slovenia is a beekeeper, they make a stop to meet one.

programme.desc: After returning from another disappointing audition, Joey tries to write a play in which he can star. Meanwhile, Rachel gets a date with her neighbour Danny, but is perturbed to discover his extremely intimate relationship with his sexy sister.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With All the Resolutions
programme.desc: The friends make their New Year resolutions, and Joey tries to arrange for Chandler to kiss Monica at midnight at a New Years Eve party.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Chandlers Work Laugh
programme.desc: Monica is annoyed when she discovers Chandler is ingratiating himself with his new boss Doug. He even has a fake laugh which he uses whenever Doug cracks a joke. Meanwhile, Rachel is obsessed with finding out the gossip between Monica and Chandler after overhearing a sexy conversation between them, and Ross astounds everyone with his new girlfriend, a blast from the past.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: At her grandmothers funeral, Phoebe is astounded to meet her biological father, Frank Sr, who she has been trying to find for years. Elsewhere, Chandler tells perfectionist Monica that she is useless at massage, and Joeys fondness for an expensive bag loses him an audition.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Everybody Finds Out
programme.desc: Chandler and Monicas relationship becomes less of a secret, and Ross must prove to his boss that hes sane in order to return to work.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Girl Who Hits Joey
programme.desc: Chandler becomes anxious when he thinks Monica wants more from their relationship, and Ross moves into his new apartment and fails to impress his new neighbours. Meanwhile, Joey is afraid to end his relationship with a diminutive woman who punches him hard every time she thinks something is fun.

programme.title: Jimmy Carrs Am I the A******?
programme.sub-title: A Burger Burglar and a Supermarket Sweeper
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr, Jamali Maddix and GK Barry have some controversial behaviour to contend with. Theres a shopping trolley thief, and a mother and daughter settle an awkward dispute.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The next stop on Bradley and Barney Walshs European road trip is Switzerland. They take in the breath-taking views with a ride on a mountain rollercoaster, before exercising their vocal chords when they try the Swiss tradition of yodeling. The following day, Barney arranges a unique way for them to enjoy some local cheese, and then drive to the Contra Dam, where Barney reveals they are about to attempt one of James Bonds most iconic stunts, a petrifying 220 metre-high bungee jump.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The father and son have reached Slovenia, a country that loves its sport. Brads passion for bikes gives Barney an excuse to take his dad motocross racing. After hearing that one in 200 people in Slovenia is a beekeeper, they make a stop to meet one.

programme.title: Al Murray: One Man, One Guvnor
Utopia
programme.desc: Tony is on the verge of completing a major report when Rhonda invites a documentary crew to spend a week at the NBA offices. The NBA staff is divided over office catering.

programme.title: Utopia
programme.desc: Tony finds himself at loggerheads with Rhonda and Jim after refusing to back a major government initiative. Nat and Ash must break some bad news to the Minister.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Stans ancient grandfather attempts to trick the boys into killing him. Meanwhile, the parents of South Park lobby a TV network to rid the airwaves of Terrance and Phillip.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: Its Halloween and the Mir Space Station crashes to Earth, killing Kenny on impact. Soon, the zombies are taking over Southpark. Can the boys defeat the zombies before its too late?

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The boys are watching a Terrance and Philip special in Cartmans house. When they see a commercial offering a free sports watch with a five dollar donation to famine relief, theyre overjoyed, but instead of receiving a watch, the boys receive an Ethiopian boy.

programme.title: South Park
programme.desc: The Mayor decides to impose an inoffensive holiday theme, which wont offend anybody. Kyle thinks he has the answer with Mr Hankey, a talking poo.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. The series also keeps tabs on the efforts of teenager Parker Schnabel and old-timer Dakota Fred to hit the mother lode at separate sites.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the 100th episode of the popular US sitcom, Leonard decides to ask Penny out on a date, and they both agree to give their relationship another chance. They argue over dinner and remember why things didnt work out between them in the first place, but end up sleeping together anyway. Later they agree to continue seeing each other secretly, on the condition that they act like friends when everyone else is around.

programme.title: The Simpsons

Crowned by its titular overture and the song Vincent, McLeans equally moving tribute to Van Gogh, American Pie is a classic of the folk-rock genre, earning its place alongside Carole Kings Tapestry, Joni Mitchells Blue and Neil Youngs After The Goldrush as one of the landmark singer-songwriter LPs of 1971, a year recently celebrated in a book by award-winning journalist David Hepworth as rocks golden year.

programme.title: Fast and Furious Presents: Hobbs and Shaw
programme.desc: Brixton Lorr is a cybernetically enhanced soldier who possesses superhuman strength, a brilliant mind and a lethal pathogen that could wipe out half of the worlds population. Its now up to hulking lawman Luke Hobbs and lawless operative Deckard Shaw to put aside their past differences and work together to prevent the seemingly indestructible Lorr from destroying humanity.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Cleaner
programme.desc: Radical activists take 300 hostages at an energy companys annual gala in a high-rise building. Its now up to a former soldier who works as a window cleaner to save the hostages trapped inside, including her younger brother.

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Bricklayer
programme.desc: A rogue insurgent assassinates foreign journalists and makes it look like the CIA is responsible. Coaxed out of retirement to clear the agencys name, a deadly operative must confront his checkered past while unraveling an international conspiracy.

programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Terminator Salvation
programme.desc: After the triumph of the machines on Judgement Day and with killer robots hunting down the last vestiges of humanity, resistance fighter John Connor battles back. However, the arrival of a mysterious stranger threatens to tip the balance in favour of the machines.

programme.title: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
programme.desc: Mikaela and Sam once again join forces with Optimus Prime again to save Earth from ruthless robot The Fallen.

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan
programme.desc: Lured from Victorian England to the wilds of the Congo, Tarzan must return to the jungle to save his captive wife from King Leopolds devious envoy.

programme.title: Aquaman
programme.desc: Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis -- and the surface world -- from his power-hungry brother.

programme.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and the Decepticons become involved in a space race to find a hidden Cybertronian spacecraft stranded on the Moon. Sam Witwicky must come to the aid of the Autobots to defeat the evil Decepticons to stop them discovering the secrets of the Cybertronian craft.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One mans brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after its revealed hes a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.desc: After Boog switches places with a circus bear, Elliott and the gang must rescue him before the circus returns home to Russia.

programme.title: Monster Family
programme.desc: Draculas spell turns a woman and her loved ones into a vampire, a mummy, a werewolf and Frankensteins monster.

programme.title: Monster Family 2
programme.desc: Baba Yaga and Renfield are captured by a monster hunter so the Wishbone family once again transform into a vampire Frankensteins monster a mummy and a werewolf in a bid to free them.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Home
programme.desc: After an alien race called the Boov take over Earth, a resourceful human girl becomes a banished Boovs ally.

programme.title: Flushed Away
programme.desc: A spoiled rat gets flushed down the toilet and finds himself stranded in Londons sewer underworld. A savvy scavenger helps him evade frog assassins and make his way back to his plush home.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody and Sherman
programme.desc: Mr. Peabody, the most accomplished canine in the world, and his boy, Sherman, use a time machine called the Wabac to embark on outrageous adventures. However, when Sherman takes the Wabac without permission to impress his friend Penny, he accidentally rips a hole in the universe and causes havoc with world history. Its up to Mr. Peabody to mount a rescue and prevent the past, present and future from being permanently altered. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Dog Man
programme.desc: A life-saving surgery fuses together a police officer and his faithful police dog -- and Dog Man is born. Learning to embrace his new identity, Dog Man must stop feline supervillain Petey the Cat from cloning himself and going on a crime spree.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: Smurfs: The Lost Village
programme.desc: With the evil wizard Gargamel hot on their trail, Smurfette, Brainy, Clumsy and Hefty embark on a journey through the Forbidden Forest to find a mysterious village.

programme.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas
programme.desc: The brave mariner Sinbad battles raging elements, mutinous dogs and fearsome monsters to retrieve the Book of Peace after being framed by the treacherous Goddess of Chaos. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
programme.desc: The story of a wild mustang stallion captured by horse traders and sold to a cavalry regiment at a frontier outpost, where a cruel colonel attempts to break the free-spirited horse. However, he escapes in the company of a Native American youth and embarks upon a series of adventures in the harsh and unforgiving times of the Old West.

programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: Batman Unlimited: Monster Mayhem
programme.desc: The Dark Knight assembles his heroic friends like Green Arrow and Nightwing to stop the Joker and his cronies from unleashing a diabolical computer virus.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Were the Millers
programme.desc: Indebted to a big-time drug lord, a pot dealer travels to Mexico with a fake family and a camper to pick up a large shipment and smuggle it into the U.S.

programme.title: Disaster Movie
programme.desc: A group of twentysomethings attempt to survive an onslaught of earthquakes, asteroids and other impending catastrophes.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality
programme.desc: An uncouth FBI agent goes undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant as a contestant to flush out a terrorist who plans to bomb the event. The hard-nosed cop, who prides herself on her toughness, must discard her trainers and feminise her behaviour if she is to avoid blowing her cover.

programme.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous
programme.desc: FBI agent Gracie is given another makeover to become the face of the Bureau, prior to embarking on a promotional tour. When two of her friends are kidnapped - Miss USA and a beauty pageant director - she decides to investigate on her own, in defiance of orders to the contrary.

programme.title: Yesterday
programme.desc: Jack Malik is a struggling singer-songwriter in an English seaside town whose dreams of fame are rapidly fading, despite the fierce devotion and support of his childhood best friend, Ellie. After a freak bus accident during a mysterious global blackout, Jack wakes up to discover that The Beatles have never existed. Performing songs by the greatest band in history to a world that has never heard them, Jack becomes on overnight sensation with a little help from his agent.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: While New York detectives Christopher Danson and PK Highsmith wow the city with their heroics, colleagues Allen Gamble and Terry Hoitz are the `other guys. Chained to their desks, forensic accountant Gamble and disgraced cop Hoitz are at each others throats when an unfortunate incident gives them the opportunity to prove themselves.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: When Nature Calls
programme.desc: Sequel about the zany private detective who specialises in locating missing pets. Ace Ventura travels to Africa to search for a kidnapped sacred albino bat, which reputedly has the power to restore peace between two warring tribes.

programme.title: Billy Madison
programme.desc: Billy is the son of hotel chain magnate Brian Madison and expects to inherit the family fortune, but hes shocked when his father stipulates he wont unless he passes 12th grade in just 24 weeks. It will be tough, since he never passed 1st grade. Determined to prove his father wrong, Billy enrols at school.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: Playboy vet Henry sets his heart on romancing Lucy, but she has short-term memory loss; she cant remember anything that happened the day before. So every morning, Henry has to woo her again. Her friends and family are very protective, and Henry must convince them that hes in it for love.

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: Two inseparable best friends navigate the last weeks of high school and are invited to a gigantic house party. Together with their nerdy friend, they spend a long day trying to score enough alcohol to supply the party and inebriate two girls in order to kick-start their sex lives before they go off to college. Their quest is complicated after one of them falls in with two inept cops who are determined to show him a good time.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: The Bedford Incident
programme.desc: Thriller about a photojournalist on board a destroyer, the Bedford, commanded by Captain Finlander. When the ship discovers a Soviet sub in Greenlands territorial waters, the Captain begins a relentless pursuit that pushes his crew to breaking point.

programme.title: Rent
programme.desc: Artists, junkies and misfits in New Yorks East Village struggle with poverty, illness and the Aids epidemic.

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Coach Ken Carter, a controversial high school basketball coach who received national attention when he benched his undefeated team due to their collective poor academic record in 1999. In the face of much criticism, Carter fought to keep his methods, determined to show the boys that they need to rely on more than sports for their futures.

programme.title: Hardball
programme.desc: A selfish gambler works off his debt by coaching a baseball team comprised of underprivileged youths.

programme.title: About a Boy
programme.desc: Parallel coming-of-age stories of a layabout `serial nice guy living a posh, carefree lifestyle off his deceased fathers fortune, and a bright but awkward youth whos tired of his mothers depressed, boyfriend-less state. Their paths collide when the boy fabricates a two-year-old son and joins a group called S.P.A.T. (Single Parents Alone Together).

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Amadeus
programme.desc: Once the highly regarded composer to the Viennese Court, Salieri is now an old man, unknown and confined to an asylum. After a suicide attempt he recounts his story to a young cleric, going back 30 years to his heyday at the court of Emperor Joseph II, where he first met the young Mozart. Despite Salieris Machiavellian attempts to frustrate Mozarts progress, the great young composer attracts the favour of the Emperor.

programme.title: The Shawshank Redemption
programme.desc: Andy Dufresne and Ellis Boyd `Red Redding are two prisoners serving long sentences in the vicious Shawshank jail. The two come to terms with their imprisonment while surviving the sadistic acts of prison warden Samuel Norton, and for both, a different sort of redemption awaits.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Believing theyve left behind the shadowy figures from the past, billionaire Christian Grey and his new wife, Anastasia, fully embrace their inextricable connection and shared life of luxury. But just as the Greys begin to step into their new roles, sinister events come to light and jeopardise their happy ending before it even begins.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander, two sisters and a No-Maj battle dark forces while tracking down magical creatures set free in the wizarding world of 1926 New York.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Magizoologist Newt Scamander joins forces with young Albus Dumbledore to prevent the devious Gellert Grindelwald from raising pure-blood wizards to rule over all non-magical beings.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Secrets of Dumbledore
programme.desc: Professor Albus Dumbledore knows the powerful, dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald is moving to seize control of the wizarding world. Unable to stop him alone, he entrusts magizoologist Newt Scamander to lead an intrepid team of wizards and witches.

programme.title: Blithe Spirit
programme.desc: A spiritualist medium holds a seance for a writer suffering from writers block but accidentally summons the spirit of his deceased first wife which leads to an increasingly complex love triangle with his current wife of five years.

programme.title: Small Soldiers
programme.desc: A toy company develops action-figure soldiers whose realistic fighting capabilities cause mayhem for a toy-shop owner and his family. Unaware of their military prowess, the shop keeper takes delivery of the soldiers, who break free from their packaging to attack their Gorgonite enemies. When the Gorgonites communicate with the shop keepers son, the humans find themselves under siege.

programme.title: Yogi Bear
programme.desc: Yogi, Boo Boo and Ranger Smith team up to try to stop the mayor from closing Jellystone Park and selling it to loggers.

programme.title: Nativity 2: Danger in the Manger!
programme.desc: A new teacher juggles his pregnant wife and a class of children on a road trip.

programme.title: Nativity 3: Dude Wheres My Donkey?
programme.desc: An Ofsted inspector arrives at St. Bernadettes and forgets who he is.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Washed-up stuntman Luo seeks help from his estranged daughter and her lawyer boyfriend when his beloved stunt horse may be auctioned off to pay his debts. Luo and Red Hare become a media sensation when their fight with debt collectors goes viral.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: The evil mummy Imhotep returns to wreak havoc as he resumes his relentless search for power and immortality. To make matters worse, another ancient evil has been unleashed, even more dangerous than Imhotep. Only the heroic Rick OConnell and his intrepid Egyptologist wife stand in the way of these twin terrors as they embark upon a desperate mission to save the world.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Mouse Hunt
programme.desc: Slapstick tale which follows the misfortunes of two hard-up brothers whose plans to renovate and sell a valuable building are jeopardised by a rogue mouse. The brothers soon find themselves pulling out all the stops in order to evict their tiny resident.

programme.title: Spy Kids
programme.desc: Two siblings set out on a mission to rescue their ex-spy parents. Summoned back to work from their uneventful lives, the adults run into trouble while on duty. When the children are called upon to help them, they find out about their parents former identities while at the same time developing a greater appreciation for each other.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Matilda is a gifted child, more gifted than any other, but her parents wont let her go to school. She teaches herself for years by going to the library and reading everything she sees. Eventually she convinces her parents to let her go to school, but discovers her special talents are needed to protect the school and her lovely teacher from the evil headmistress.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. programme.title: I Am Legend
programme.desc: In the year 2012, scientists engineer a cure for cancer. Three years later, every human in New York is dead or mutated into a light-sensitive zombie by the virus that was supposed to heal. Only one man survives, virologist Robert Neville. He has two aims: find a cure for the virus and make contact with other survivors.

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Robert McCalls mysterious past cuts especially close to home when thugs kill Susan Plummer, his best friend and former colleague. Now out for revenge, McCall must take on a crew of highly trained assassins who will stop at nothing to destroy him.

programme.title: True Romance
programme.desc: Shop clerk Clarence falls for a prostitute, steals a fortune in cocaine and goes on the run, pursued by psychotic mobster Vincenzo.
An epic adventure about a global cataclysm that brings an end to the world and tells of the heroic struggle of the survivors.

programme.title: Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga
programme.desc: Snatched from the Green Place of Many Mothers, young Furiosa gets caught in the crossfire of two tyrannical warlords. As the tyrants fight for dominance, Furiosa soon finds herself in a nonstop battle to make her way home.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers, and falls in love with, a struggling but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: Luckiest Man In America
programme.desc: An ice-cream truck driver discovers a secret way to win as a contestant on the game show `Press Your Luck.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music thats always been inside him.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travel sequel with Marty McFly and the eccentric inventor Doc Brown travelling back and forth in time to stop their nemesis tampering with history. By stealing the time machine and travelling back in time himself, Biff Tannen gives his younger self a book containing fifty years of sports statistics which he uses to amass an enormous gambling fortune and power.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: Marty McFly travels to the American Wild West of 1885 in a desperate bid to save Doc Brown from becoming another victim of a black-hatted gunslinger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In England 2027, worldwide infertility has left the population on the brink of extinction and all hope of a cure is lost. However, underground activist Julian shows up with a miraculously pregnant girl.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice continues her journey to find survivors after the world is hit by a virus infection which turns its victims in the Undead. With help from an old friend, Alice leads the survivors to Los Angeles, which she believes is a safe haven. However, its all a trap set up by the Umbrella Corporation, who want her dead.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Get Out
programme.desc: A young photographer uncovers a dark secret when he meets his girlfriends seemingly friendly parents for the first time at their posh estate.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Passengers
programme.desc: Awakened from their hibernation pods 90 years early, two space travellers enjoy the pleasures of a budding romance until they discover that their ship is in imminent danger.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A leaving party for New Yorker Rob Hawkins is rudely interrupted by the arrival of an unwelcome guest, something that has a penchant for smashing up skyscrapers, playing football with the Statue of Libertys head and handpicking humans as snacks.

programme.title: All I Want for Christmas
programme.desc: A girl presents a department-store Santa with an odd request: reunite her divorced parents before her mother remarries.

programme.title: Maps and Mistletoe
programme.desc: A cartographer and an explorer find an unexpected connection while working on a novelty treasure map of the North Pole.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: Its a Wonderful Life
programme.desc: George Bailey has so many problems he is thinking about ending it all - and its Christmas! As the angels discuss George, we see his life in flashback. As George is about to jump from a bridge, he ends up rescuing his guardian angel, Clarence - who then shows George what his town would have looked like if it hadnt been for all his good deeds over the years.

programme.desc: When a couples tropical Christmas holiday is cancelled they are forced to pay visits to all four of their divorced parents in one day.

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santas bitter big brother has to find his Christmas spirit before the season is ruined for the whole world.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Youve Got Mail
programme.desc: Two rival bookstore owners are unaware that they are conducting a secret romance with each other on the Internet. When they discover the truth, they must prevent their business rivalry from interfering with their growing personal intimacy.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Maps and Mistletoe

programme.title: Force of Nature: The Dry 2
programme.desc: Five women head out on a remote hiking retreat but only four return, each telling a different story. Detective Aaron Falk tries to find out what happened before time runs out.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A former jewel thief is suspected of returning to a life of crime when a new wave of robberies hits the French Riviera.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: A troubled female cop must unravel the perfect murder as she matches wits with two homicidal schoolboys, who believe they cant be caught after committing a motiveless crime. As she gets ever closer to the truth she at once alienates her new partner and puts her own life in peril.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: The Saint
programme.desc: A master of disguise falls in love with the brilliant scientist who developed a valuable formula he was hired to steal.

programme.title: Force of Nature: The Dry 2
programme.desc: Five women head out on a remote hiking retreat but only four return, each telling a different story. Detective Aaron Falk tries to find out what happened before time runs out.

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A former jewel thief is suspected of returning to a life of crime when a new wave of robberies hits the French Riviera.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: A man diagnosed with 23 separate personalities kidnaps and imprisons three teenage girls, who must try to escape before his terrifying 24th personality finally comes to light.

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: While on a Global War on Terror summit in Spain, the president of the United States falls victim to an attempted assassination. Seen from different perspectives, the event is told and re-told by the presidents bodyguards and members of the audience.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Murder by Numbers
programme.desc: A troubled female cop must unravel the perfect murder as she matches wits with two homicidal schoolboys, who believe they cant be caught after committing a motiveless crime. As she gets ever closer to the truth she at once alienates her new partner and puts her own life in peril.

programme.title: Red Dragon
programme.desc: Thriller adapted from Thomas Harriss first Hannibal Lecter novel about an FBI profiler called out of retirement to help catch a serial killer nicknamed the Tooth Fairy. The agent has the uncanny ability to project himself into the minds of his criminal prey, but the case forces him to confront his past and consult his former nemesis - the now-incarcerated Dr Hannibal Lecter.

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Based on three hybridising narrative strands, three groups of villains are intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Turkish and Tommy team up with a pugilistic Irish gypsy named Mickey for the purpose of rigging unlicensed boxing matches. However, their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. To complicate further, a New York gangster arrives on the scene.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. programme.title: Kingdom Of Dreams

programme.title: Escobar By Escobar

programme.title: The Yogurt Shop Murders

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah look forward to winning medals in the Tickety-lympics Sports Games. Theyll have to use their special ability to win the day before Chime Time.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Flamingo Festival
programme.desc: Pauline the pelican is looking forward to the Flamingo Festival on Waterlily Lake and excited to hear that Isobel is this years Flamingo Queen. She loves to watch the flamingoes practising their dance, and secretly copies their moves. When Isobel hurts herself, everybody is worried that the Flamingo Festival will have to be cancelled. That is, until a surprising understudy steps in to take Isobels place.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Whale Trip
programme.desc: The puffins of Mossy Bay are excited to be going on a whale trip with Hercule Moustache. Hercule points out all manner of sights and sounds as they ride on Thelma the whale, but the boisterous puffins dont always listen to Hercule, and frequently interrupt the poor walrus. The puffins soon learn how important it is to listen to your elders when out on a trip.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Jimjameree Tree
programme.desc: Joey the kangaroo and his friends all love to play by the jimjamaree tree. They are devastated when the tree is struck by lightning in a big storm. Together with Wally Two Trees they do everything they can to ensure their favourite tree comes back to life, with magical results.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Joey the kangaroo and his friend love playing boomerang ball together. However when their mums fall out they are no longer allowed to play with each other. Can the friends work together to reconcile their mums so that they can play again?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Zeds Really Helpful Mood
programme.desc: Zed the zebra decides to help all of his friends on the savannah. However, he does not always listen to them, and tries to help them in the way that he sees fit. Unfortunately, he ends up being more of a hindrance than a help.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Horace the Hare
programme.desc: Bao Bao the panda loves nothing more than greeting his friends with a warm hug. Yet every time he tries to give Horace the hare a big hug, Horace runs away as he is nervous - nobody has ever given him a hug before. Will Horace learn to love big panda hugs like his other friends?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Cooking Contest
programme.desc: Horace the hare and Bao Bao the panda cant agree who is the better chef, so it is decided that they will hold a cooking contest and their friends will decide who is the winner. Unfortunately, Horace and Bao Bao get so caught up in the competition that everything starts to go wrong.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Alfie and Charlies Canoe
programme.desc: Alfie and Charlie the chipmunks have always dreamed of exploring the river. They are excited when Randolph the raccoon agrees to take them on a canoeing trip. However, in their haste to set off, they forget vital equipment.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Confuse-Us the Carp
programme.desc: Its a topsy-turvy day as Bao Bao the panda and Horace the hare set off on their morning walk - nothing is as it should be and the two friends cant understand why. Confuse-Us the wise old carp tells them that the ping and the pong are out of balance. The friends set off to try and put things right.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane

programme.desc: Bao Bao the panda and Cassandra the crane are best friends. The race is on to free him before Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah are having fun helping their friends, but dont stop first to ask what their friends need. So Lopsiloo finds herself on the wrong side of the bridge, the wrong goods are served in Battersbys shop and Puffertys favourite ball is thrown out when they tidy his kennel. It is only when they take McCogginss scooter away for cleaning that they finally realise the error of their ways.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is cleaning the clockhouse so Tommy and Tallulah take their jammy sandwiches to their room to eat. Whatever will Madame Au Lait say.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Savannah Craze
programme.desc: Doris the duck is fed up of always playing the same old games with her friends. She wants to invent a new and fun game they can all play but her other friends are reluctant to join in. She heads off on her own, and soon the other animals are intrigued by the strange bouncy boingy noises that can be heard across the savannah.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of a Long Night in the Jungle
programme.desc: Giggles and Tickles are so excited about their birthday the next day that they vow to stay up all night long so that they dont miss a single moment of it. The other animals on the savannah are tired and soon go to bed. Can the mischievous monkeys find ways to keep themselves awake all night and still enjoy their birthday?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of a the Record-Breaking Puffins

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Ronald and His Boulders

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the House of Leaves

When the house of leaves comes crashing down, Nelson wastes no time in telling Nigel off.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of Gertie the Goat

The other animals advise Gertie against the trip, since pandas are not renowned for their climbing skills. Will Gertie and Bao Bao prove the others wrong, or will they need some help from their friends?

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.sub-title: The Story of the Great Rains
programme.desc: The savannah animals are busy preparing for the great rains, which are due any day. The rains flood the plains every year and they will have to take shelter on Blue Mountain. This year it is Giggles and Tickles turn to keep watch for the start of the rain.

programme.title: 64 Zoo Lane
programme.desc: Nelson is in an inventive mood, and agrees to make various objects for his friends. Alan the aardvark is excited about the scooter that Nelson is making him - even though he doesnt really know what a scooter is. The other animals all take it in turns to help deliver the scooter to Alan, each making their own modifications to the vehicle on the way. Alan is delighted when his very own scooter eventually arrives.

How can they talk her down safely?

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah offer to do the polishing so that Madame Au Lait can make their favourite fruity trifle. While she is out buying the ingredients, the twins go polish crazy, thinking that the more they use the happier Madame Au Lait will be and the more trifle she will make. The clockhouse is gleaming when Madame Au Lait returns, but when she sets a hoof on the floor she finds that it as slippery as an ice rink.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins are asked to collect McCogginss bell for a town performance.
